challenges.title: Sum of Three Numbers
challenges.description: Read three integers (each on a separate line) and print their sum.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: the sum of the three numbers.

challenges.title: Say Hi
challenges.description: Read a name and print: Hi <name>

challenges.title: Square of a Number
challenges.description: Read an integer and print its square.

challenges.title: Area of Right Triangle
challenges.description: Read the base and height of a right-angled triangle (each on a new line) and print its area. Use formula: area = 0.5 * base * height. Print as a floating-point number.
challenges.inputDescription: Two real numbers: base and height, one per line.

challenges.title: Hello, Name!
challenges.description: Read a name and print: Hello, <name>! There should be a comma after Hello, and no space before the exclamation mark.

challenges.title: Apples for Students
challenges.description: N students take K apples and share them equally. Print how many apples each student gets and how many remain in the basket.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers N and K (students and apples).
challenges.outputDescription: Two integers: apples per student and remaining apples, separated by a space.

challenges.title: Previous and Next
challenges.description:
Given an integer n, print its previous and next numbers in the exact format: 
The next number for the number n is <next>.
The previous number for the number n is <prev>.
challenges.outputDescription: Two lines of text as described.
examples:
Input:
10

Output:
The next number for the number 10 is 11.
The previous number for the number 10 is 9.

tests.expected:
The next number for the number 10 is 11.
The previous number for the number 10 is 9.

The next number for the number 0 is 1.
The previous number for the number 0 is -1.

challenges.title: Last Digit
challenges.description: Given an integer n, print its last digit.
challenges.outputDescription: One digit: the last decimal digit of n.

challenges.title: Tens Digit
challenges.description: Given an integer n, print its tens digit (the second digit from the right).

challenges.title: Sum of Digits (Three-Digit)
challenges.description: Given a three-digit integer n, print the sum of its digits.
challenges.inputDescription: Three-digit integer n (100 to 999 or -999 to -100).
